Text:
ANY CHANCE ANYONE CAN SEED THE OTHERS
PLEASE!!!
Is this the first or second series???

Hi!

I know it's toooooooo late for this torrent, but I started downloading it two weeks ago. It seemed to be completed then, but now it's stuck at 52,2%. Parts one and three of the series are ok (and I'm seeding them).

Can anyone please please please reseed this one?

I've waited for more than twenty years to watch it again (here in Spain nobody remembered it) and now that I found it... It's gone! :_(
I'll seed this - just grabbing it now.
